title: Finding My Escape
description: Hannah Jordan's life is shattered when she walks in on the double homicide of her parents. Transplanted from Atlanta to a small town in East Tennessee, she finds her solace in running the beautiful mountain trails behind her auntâ€™s house. Until she begins dreaming of the mysterious, but handsome Josh, that is. As Hannah is tortured by memories of the night her parents died, she is disturbed by the idea that she may be forgetting something important. Aided by her best friend, Matt, she begins to uncover clues indicating that what she had believed was a simple home invasion was actually something much more sinister. And the killer is still out there.Finding My Escape is a teen novel mixing romance with suspense and a twist of the paranormal.
author: Fran Veal
